posts.post_title: Buchner Old Judge & Allen & Ginter Cubs
posts.post_content:
The following three cards are available:

1887 Buchner Gold Coin Silver Flint Sgc 20 $145

1887 N172 Old Judge Jimmy Ryan SGC 10 (back damage but great photo registration) $145 SOLD

1888 N29 Allen & Ginter Jimmy Ryan  SGC 20 $155

Prices include Insured Shipping and any payment method is acceptable (no fees added).  Feel free to look at any of the other cards I have for sale and make an offer.

Front and Back scans can be seen at the link below:
[url]http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/FOR%20SALE/PreWar/[/url]
Prices reduced in celebration of the weekend!

Tim is going to be away for a while taking care of some emergency family business. I am locking this thread per himself as he will be away for a while. If you are in the middle of anything and Tim doesn't get back with you please shoot me an email at [URL="leonl@flash.net."]leonl@flash.net.[/URL]
Please try to have a little patience....
